name: Disable Admin tool Bar
author: Yusuf Mudagal

sections.description: For developers, the toolbar can slightly throw off a theme’s design. The toolbar is just distracting. Here is a plugin which helps to hide the the admin bar.
sections.installation:
1. Upload disable_admin_tool_Bar to the wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Enjoy!, there are no settings for this.
sections.faq:
What this plugin does?

The plugin hides the

How is this plugin useful?

This plugin removes distraction caused form the admin bar from the screen and helps you work smoothly.

How to use the plugin?

Easy to use! Just go to the plugin section and hit the download button.

short_description: Hide the Admin tool Bar in WordPress 3.1+
